name: Tempus Fugit - MegaJam 2020
description:
You travel back in time to prevent a tragedy from happening, by collecting time fragments which are appearing throughout the space time continuum. Once you collect enough fragments can only hope to be able to mend the hole in reality before it's too late.

A 3D platformer we created for the MegaJam 2020. This version contains the day 1 update with some fixes.

Created together with Bence, Martin and Hubert.
